Title: XNA Shader Composer
Description: XNA Shader Composer is a solution for Visual Studio 2010 and XNA 4.0. The goal is to create an environment for learn and create differents HLSL programs.

Project Description

XNA Shader Composer is a solution for Visual Studio 2010 and XNA 4.0. The goal is to create an environment to learn and create differents HLSL programs.
